channel.description: Add an enterprise IdP Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 282 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: What is an “Enterprise” IdP. We need to define it and understand whether this is the best way to split up IdPs. Changes to be made:
